medical_history.chief_complaint: Premature thelarche and prepubertal gynecomastia associated with lavender fragrance exposure.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The onset of symptoms varied among patients; specifically, one girl presented with breast bud development at age 6, while another had breast tenderness for 2 months at age 3 years and 11 months. Symptoms improved after discontinuing lavender exposure, with breast tissue growth resolving within 6 months to 3 months post-exposure cessation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Unremarkable past medical history in all reported patients; no medications were taken.
medical_history.social_history: Frequent exposure to lavender oil products, including colognes and soaps, commonly used in their communities.
